name: Card Master - Texas Hold'em - Poker - Blackjack
name_original: Card Master - Texas Hold'em - Poker - Blackjack
description:
"Card Master is far from the first iPhone card game, but it's definitely one of the better ones." -GIZMODO


3 games in 1
Card Master brings three amazing card games into one application. Texas Hold'em, Poker Classic and BlackJack.
Each of them is designed, engineered and crafted with one clear objective: to provide card players with a unique card playing experience.

Design
Virtual reality simulation is essential. As in real life, everything has forms, textures and light values. Card Master reproduces them with obsession:
The wood, the table felt, the buttons. Menu navigation is so simple and intuitive, you only have to worry about improving your card skills to become a winner. The rest... just works.

Artificial Intelligence
How smart are you? Card Master simulates human intelligence by examining large numbers of possibilities and analyzing its human opponents’ behavior.

Multiplayer
Card Master provides you with the ability to play three of the most popular card games with up to five of your friends. Nevermind bringing a deck of cards with you everywhere you go; Challenging your friends to a card game has never been easier. Card Master is the answer.

Dual deck looks
Find classic card design too small and difficult to look at? Switch card deck design on the fly, just by double tapping any card. As simple as that.

Dual betting systems
After research and testing, we've found that each betting interface has its pros and cons, that’s why Card Master provides you with both systems. Choose Chips or Slider betting interface as needed to suit your style.

Drink whisky while playing?
Shake your iPhone and hear the ice hitting the glass.
For relaxing times, make it Card Master time.
